channel.title: MagikTech Mirke
channel.description:
I will be building out a small podcasting platform, and this podcast will document it along the way. Add the feed to your podcatcher of choice to follow along: https://mirkethemeek.github.io/testpod/feed.rss

* Please note: anything & everything is subject to change at anytime.
channel.itunes:author: MagikTech Mirke

item.title: For Now... Riverside on Mobile is not a Solution
item.description:
Welcome to another spell broadcast from Magiktech Mirke.

Here is my rambling attempt at making Riverside work on my phone only.

Thanks for listening!

If you want to contact Magiktech Mirke, record a message at https://www.speakpipe.com/MirkeTheMeek

item.description:
